name: The Legend Of Bink
description: This game revolves around Bink - a monkey who really loves to push buttons. His adventures lead him into an ancient temple inside the Byrule Jungle, where there is a button in each room for Bink to press. However, Bink is quite short-sighted. There are mirrors laid around the room, wich Bink can use to see the reflection of the button from far away.
